roleset.name: go on and on, talking nonsensically

example.name: blather-v
example.text: in the essay " Are you studying Paul or studying Bill ? " , she blathers that " people who study Paul will become terrorists " ;
example.arg: in the essay "Are you studying Paul or studying Bill?"
that "people who study Paul will become terrorists"

example.name: blathering-n
example.text: It did seem to hasten the end of his blathering about the host of luminaries he 'd saved from drowning , day in day out , year after year , one after another .
example.arg: about the host of luminaries he'd saved from drowning, day in day out, year after year, one after another

roleset.note: BLATHER-V, BLATHERING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for AMR.
